name: Babbage Halbonauts
ability: A Halbonaut is guided by a HAL Turing or other central controller. Its Babbage-circuitry withstands high radiation and temperature.
imageDescription: A white humanoid robot with multiple monitor-like heads and cylindrical limbs, resembling a mechanical astronaut controlled by a central HAL-like computer system.

name: Utility Fog Halbonaut
ability: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP. All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
imageDescription: A translucent jellyfish-like entity made of networked nanobots with tendrils extending downward.

name: Biomechs
ability: Biomechatronics integrates biology, mechanics, and electronics for improved respiration, vision, metabolism, and artificial limbs.
imageDescription: A blue-tinted cybernetic hand with electronic implants and circuit boards integrated into the fingers.

name: Group Mind Immortalists
ability: PAN SAPIENS FUTURE: Req = Have 3 Factories connected to Space Elevators. Effect = Casus belli for War. +2 VP for each glory chit owned.
imageDescription: A bald humanoid head with a neural implant behind the ear.

name: Botany Bay Convicts
ability: The New Botany Bay Penal Colony is the answer to severe labor shortages in space.
imageDescription: A woman in prison attire viewed from behind, with chains floating around her hands along with work tools.

name: Soldier Caste
ability: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at an Anchored Bernal with Dirtside 5+. Effects = Casus belli for War, 10 VP. All your Humans can commit Felonies.
imageDescription: An armored soldier in a jetpack flying through a purple haze.

name: Boyle Engineering Collective
ability: Mars Nativism protects the rights of the First Hundred and native-born against those born on Earth.
imageDescription: An abstract illustration showing rows of directional arrows pointing up and down alongside an atomic orbital diagram.

name: Martian Assembly
ability: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = Have 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.
imageDescription: A classical government building with columns inside a glowing red sphere.

name: Calypso 2 Seed Sail
ability: Named after the legendary oceanographic research vessel. A closed eco-system allows low mass. Can't enter aerobrake.
imageDescription: A green diamond-shaped solar sail with illustrations of marine life including fish and squid.

name: Wet-Nano Seed Sail
ability: NEW VENUS FUTURE: Req = Decom. oper. 7+ net thrust thruster on Indust. Synodic Comet. 12 VP. Can't enter aerobrake.
imageDescription: Pinkish-red bacteria-like organisms resembling biomimetic nanotechnology.

name: Heavy Water Survivalists
ability: Libertarians, survivalists, and doomsayers convinced that the Earth is kaput. They drink heavy water (D2O) to improve radiation resistance.
imageDescription: A woman wearing a 'Don't Tread On Me' Gadsden flag t-shirt standing between two surfboard-shaped space capsules.

name: New Attica Secessionists
ability: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at a promoted Anchored Bernal. Effects = Casus belli for War, 7 VP. Boost costs are doubled for all your opponents.
imageDescription: A raised fist with WiFi signal symbols emanating from it, silhouettes of rebels in the background.

name: House of Saud
ability: The ruling royal family of Saudi Arabia is the richest dynasty in the world.
imageDescription: A young man in a Saudi Arabian military uniform with crossed swords insignia.

name: Iceworms
ability: SUBMARINER FUTURE: Req = Build 3 Submarines. Effect = Doubles your dirtside hydration.
imageDescription: An alien-looking purple humanoid with large dark eyes.

name: Juiced Cosmonauts
ability: The right stuff with nothing to lose. Drugs help against the harsh conditions.
imageDescription: Soviet-style propaganda poster showing a cosmonaut in an orange suit holding a hammer and sickle aloft.

name: Rental Body Guild
ability: ET LIFE FUTURE: Req = Have 2 or more Astrobiological Colonies. Effect = +2 VP per Astrobiological Colony.
imageDescription: White-suited humanoid bodies standing in formation.

name: Lloyd's Salvage Co.
ability: Policy of replacing corporate transactions with individual ones, enabled by reputation tracking.
imageDescription: Three people wearing VR headsets conducting a peer-to-peer transaction with digital currency symbols.

name: Svalbard Caretakers
ability: DYSON BUBBLE FUTURE: Req = Both Sites of Mercury industrialized by any player. Effects = 5 VP per Factory owned on Mercury.
imageDescription: A woman in a cryogenic preservation tube.

name: Malcolm
ability: An eccentric tycoon determined to make his mark in the High Frontier.
imageDescription: Profile view of a contemplative young man with his hand on his chin.

name: Renaissance Man
ability: ARTIFICIAL CONSCIOUSNESS FUTURE: Req = 2 promoted Colonists at an Astrobiology Dirtside. Effects = May free market any number of cards, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A bearded man at a futuristic computer workstation with holographic displays.

name: Microgravity Pantrophists
ability: Pantropy is the practice of adapting to an environment rather than altering it.
imageDescription: A cross-section of a spherical space habitat with a blue core.

name: Blue Goo Sybonts
ability: SETI FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 jovian trojans, 1 each in the greek & trojan camps. Effects = As a free action perform 1 inspiration + 1 homestead, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A hand holding a glowing DNA helix.

name: Programmable Matter
ability: Changes its physical properties in accordance with autonomous programming.
imageDescription: A metallic disc-shaped object hovering with blue magnetic field lines surrounding it.

name: Neumann Matter
ability: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, 12 VP. All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
imageDescription: A spherical nanobot structure with multiple extending manipulator arms branching in fractal patterns.

name: Rock Rats Miners' Union
ability: Human-cobot teams optimize productivity in extreme conditions.
imageDescription: A Black woman alongside a white humanoid robot, both wearing matching team insignias.

name: Alchemist Aviatrices
ability: AEROSTAT FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with Aerostat Dirtside. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 14 VP. Double isotope fuel during Factory Refuel.
imageDescription: A woman with a glowing visor.

name: Security System
ability: Provides collision protection using radar-guided lasers that nudge incoming debris off course.
imageDescription: A menacing robotic eye with a red sensor light in the center, resembling HAL 9000.

name: Frankenstein Navigator
ability: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, 12 VP. FINAO costs are halved.
imageDescription: A metallic humanoid face with mechanical features.

name: Siren Cybernautics Inc.
ability: Space employees work immersed in a solution of high-oxygen PFCs, breathing with liquid-filled lungs.
imageDescription: A humanoid figure submerged in liquid with closed eyes and a serene expression.

name: Josephson Implants
ability: SUPREME CULT FUTURE: Req = Active Law in authority. Effects = May lobby w/o removing the delegate used. 10 VP. FINAO costs are halved.
imageDescription: A man wearing headphones with a contemplative expression.

name: Smart Pets
ability: Lab animals enhanced with brain-computer interface technology.
imageDescription: A lab rat wearing a small white helmet with brain-computer interface technology.

name: Creeper Neogen
ability: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, 12 VP. All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
imageDescription: A translucent blue-green blob-like organism.

name: Transorbital Railworkers
ability: Started from a small federally-subsidized launching operation.
imageDescription: A cross-shaped space station or orbital rail platform hovering above Earth.

name: Kaluga Naniteers
ability: TNO FUTURE: Req = Industrialize 2 Sites in the Neptune Zone. Effects = Can homestead as a free action, 12 VP. Your Aqua from a Free Market is doubled.
imageDescription: A woven mesh of nanocables and fullerenes in a repeating hexagonal pattern.

name: Vatican Observers
ability: The Jesuit Orbiting Observatory is the Vatican's attempt to oversee the directions of technology and science.
imageDescription: A priest in black robes gesturing over a holographic display showing voting options.

name: Eugenic Pilgrims
ability: FOOTFALL FUTURE: Req = Decom. oper. 7+ net thrust thruster on Indust. Synodic Comet. Effects = 10 VP + Casus belli.
imageDescription: Human fetuses in transparent pods.

name: Beowulf Internet
ability: The exoglobal network of commodity computing used by all AI's from robots to ship's computers.
imageDescription: Satellites and spacecraft connected by dotted communication lines around a planet.

name: Grendel
ability: EXONET FUTURE: Req = Colonies in 4 Heliocentric Zones. Effects = choose any contract deck when fundraising, 11 VP. +1 Aqua from Pool after you do a free market op.
imageDescription: A network of glowing blue nodes and connections spanning space.

name: Combat Quadrupeds
ability: Predatory quadrupeds have long haunted the primal fears of Humans. Four legs have highly efficient mobility over almost any terrain.
imageDescription: A four-legged robotic combat machine with a spherical head sensor.

name: Lernaean Warbots
ability: UNION WAR FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted augmented Robots at your Colony on Size 7+ Site. Effect = Casus belli, 9 VP. All your Stacks are Glitch-free.
imageDescription: A white spherical robot with multiple camera-eye heads on stalks.

name: Nano-3D Printers
ability: With a sufficiently powerful boost of microwave power, a probe that masses only a few grams can perform interstellar reconnaissance.
imageDescription: A honeycomb hexagonal mesh pattern of carbon nanotubes or graphene.

name: Offworld Replicators
ability: VON NEUMANN FUTURE: Req = Decom. this card & Operational refinery at your Synodic Comet Factory. Effects = Your Robots are always Promoted, 9 VP.
imageDescription: Tall crystalline tower structures on a misty landscape.

name: Self-designing Heuristics
ability: With fusion of convolutional neural networks and genetic algorithms, it is possible to create self-sustaining source code.
imageDescription: A wireframe human head profile with puzzle pieces and neural network patterns.

name: Apex Algorithms
ability: SPACE SURVEILLANCE FUTURE: Req = Active Law in Freedom. Effects = Space Republic established, 9 VP. Insight. FINAO cost for Epic Hazard Rolls halved.
imageDescription: Abstract geometric shapes including a sphere with radiating arrows.

name: Cobots
ability: Intelligent humaniform robots optimized to protect and serve the interests of a collective.
imageDescription: A white humanoid robot standing protectively beside a Black woman with natural hair.

name: Singularity
ability: VINGE FUTURE: Req = This card at Promoted Bernal and have completed an Exodus contract. Effects = Space Empire established, emancipate Robots, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A family standing in a grassy field gazing at futuristic angular structures in the distance.

name: Sensor Web Sail
ability: A mesh of fine wires with integrated circuits is propelled by and powered by a beam of microwaves. Can't enter aerobrake.
imageDescription: A square mesh sail with crossed support beams illuminated by a central light source.

name: Wisp
ability: TNO LAB FUTURE: Req = This card and 2 other Promoted Colonists at your Colony in the Outer Zone. Endgame Effect = +4 VP per Factory in the Outer Zone. Cannot enter aerobrake.
imageDescription: A delicate reflective solar sail spacecraft above Earth's curved horizon.
